TypeSignature.Value: public interface IChannelListener<TChannel> : System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener where TChannel : class, IChannel

.class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelListener`1<class (class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel) TChannel> implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IChannelListener(Of TChannel) Implements IChannelListener
generic <typename TChannel> where TChannel : class, IChannelpublic interface class IChannelListener : System::ServiceModel::Channels::IChannelListener

typeparam.name: TChannel
typeparam.span: 通道侦听器接受的通道类型。

span.span: The type of channel that the channel listener accepts.

summary.span: 定义一个接口，通道侦听器必须实现该接口才能接受类型特定的通道。

span.span: Defines the interface that must be implemented by channel listeners to accept type-specific channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 或 接口的侦听器工厂为服务提供一些机制，用于接受由客户端（这些客户端启动并启用与服务的通信）生成的通道。Listener factories that implement the or interfaces provide services with the mechanisms used to accept the channels produced by clients that initiate and enable communication with a service. 通过实现 协定，用户可以接受具有某种给定类型的多个通道，而不必每次都指定通道类型。Implementing the contract allows users to accept multiple channels of a given type without having to specify the channel type each time. 换言之，将通道类型定义为 接口的泛型参数意味着无需将类型传递到 方法中。In other words, defining the channel type as a generic parameter for the interface means that it is not necessary to pass the type into the methods. 如果用户希望接受不同的通道类型，则可以为所需要的每个通道类型创建其他通道侦听器。If users want to accept different channel types, they can create additional channel listeners for each type of channel required.

summary.span: 接受具有指定类型的通道以便与客户端进行通信。

span.span: Accepts a channel of a specified type for communication with a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议使用带有显式超时的 重载。It is recommended that the overload with the explicit timeout be used. 为该方法指定的 `timeout` 会重写系统为服务设置的所有默认超时。The `timeout` specified for that method overrides any default timeouts set by the system for the service.

span.span: Accepts a channel of a specified type for communication with a client.

span.span: A channel of type accepted by the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议使用带有显式超时的 重载。It is recommended that the overload with the explicit timeout be used. 为该方法指定的 `timeout` 会重写系统为服务设置的所有默认超时。The `timeout` specified for that method overrides any default timeouts set by the system for the service.

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，指定在超时前可用于完成等待通道操作的时间长度。

span.span: The that specifies how long the wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.

summary.span: 接受具有指定类型的通道以便在指定时间间隔内与客户端进行通信。

span.span: Accepts a channel of a specified type for communication with a client within a specified interval of time.

returns.span: 一个侦听器所接受的 类型的通道。

span.span: A channel of type accepted by the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议使用带有显式超时的此重载，而不是 。It is recommended that this overload with an explicit timeout be used rather than the . 为此方法指定的 `timeout` 会重写系统为服务设置的所有默认超时。The `timeout` specified for this method overrides any default timeouts set by the system for the service.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，在指定或默认时间间隔内接受通道。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept a channel within a specified or default interval of time.
